!2 Update when metadata changes from non repeatable to repeatable
If a child with constraints is non repeatable and than is changed to repeatable, this should be handled when a child without repeatId replaces a child with repeatId. This happens when a user without permissions updates a record.

!***> Create an instance of testWorkout
